channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Don’t steal the revelation
item.description: Learning is a journey of incompetence. First, we realize that there’s something we don’t know. Then we see that we’re going to be better at it, and we...

item.title: 5 TikToK Alternatives—And The Pros And Cons Of Each
item.description: With a TikTok ban coming soon, what are the alternatives? Here are 5 similar apps to consider, along with the pros and cons of each.

item.title: TikTok Users Report Anti-Trump Content Being Hidden Following Platform's Unbanning
item.description: Criticism emerges just days after President Trump's intervention saved TikTok from U.S. shutdown.

item.title: Trusting AI

item.title: Lulled
item.description: Selfish is easy. Short term is easy. Complacent is easy. Turning our head and ignoring the problem is easy. Going along to get along is easy. But easy...

item.title: Kinds of incompetence
item.description: The second worst is the unaware sort. The work doesn’t meet spec, and we don’t even realize it. The worst is uncaring. We know the work doesn’t meet s...

item.title: Netflix’s Best 2025 Show Regains #1 Spot In The Top 10 List
item.description: Netflix's best show in 2025, early in the year, is back on top of the top 10 list, but it will be unseated as soon as tomorrow.

item.title: DeepSeek: How China’s AI Innovators Are Challenging The Status Quo
item.description: U.S. export controls on advanced semiconductors were intended to slow China's AI progress, but they may have inadvertently spurred innovation.

item.title: Memo to the future

item.title: Don’t Miss One Of The Best Horror Movies Ever Made Before It Leaves Netflix This Week
item.description: Don't miss this terrifying movie before it leaves Netflix.
